title: Trump admin gives $10k bonuses to air traffic controllers with perfect attendance during government shutdown
text: Trump administration awards $10,000 bonuses to 776 air traffic controllers who worked during the 44-day government shutdown with perfect attendance.
summary: Trump administration awards $10,000 bonuses to 776 air traffic controllers who worked during the 44-day government shutdown with perfect attendance.
source: Latest & Breaking News on Fox News
